ml

Class FeatureExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ml.FeatureExtractor

  • public class FeatureExtractor
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to facilitate the extraction of features from an email in order to produce an input for the Machine Learning models.
    Author:
    mattgogerly

      Get the number of links that end in file extensions and put it under the numLinksFileExt key.
      private void getNumLinksNonMatching()
      Get the number of links where the text doesn't match the href attribute and put it under the numLinksNonMatching key Only consider links where the text is actually a URL so ignore Click Here!.

      • calculateStringDiff

        private int calculateStringDiff(java.lang.String x,
                                java.lang.String y)
        Utility method to calculate the difference of two Strings. Obtained from https://www.baeldung.com/java-levenshtein-distance
        Parameters:
        x - First String
        y - Second String
        Returns:
        The cost of changing x to y

        Get the cost of substituting a char for another char.
        Parameters:

        b - Char to check
        Returns:
        Cost of substituting: 1 if they don't match, 0 otherwise
